package.name: Net_Curl
package.summary: Net_Curl provides an OO interface to PHP's cURL extension
package.description: Provides an OO interface to PHP's curl extension

release.notes: -Added PHP5 compatibility maintaining BC - Fixed bugs 822 and 1200 - Added FTP Upload support - Verbose support function: New function verbose all - added the user agent option to the constructor
- Remove PEAR - Add username,password support (Alan Knowles) - add other HTTP header support, and fix wrong cookie data string (Colin Viebrock)
This is the initial release of the Net_Curl package which has been in php4/pear for a while.
